navigation.default_navigation_mode_activated: Navigation On: Use arrow keys to select preceding (←) or succeding (→) elements. Use the up (↑) and down (↓) arrows to navigate paths. Press 'N' to exit.
navigation.default_navigation_mode_deactivated: Navigation Off: Press 'N' for default navigation, 'ALT+N' for position based navigation.
navigation.local_navigation_mode_activated: Position based Nav On: Navigate nearest elements using arrow keys: (↑) for above, (↓) for below, (←) for previous, (→) for next element. Press 'ALT+N' to exit.
navigation.local_navigation_mode_deactivated: Position based Nav Off: Press 'N' for default navigation, 'ALT+N' for position based navigation.

resize.resize_mode_activated: Resize On: Use plus(+) and minus(-) to resize, 'CTRL'+'0' for default size. Press 'ESC' to exit.
resize.resize_mode_deactivated: Resize Off: Press 'ALT'+'A' for resize mode.

grid.zoom_in_grid: Select a digit from 1-9 to zoom in on the respective box.

tool_palette.marqueeTool: Currently marquee tool is only usable with mouse.
